source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How To Paint a Realistic Raccoon in Watercolor | Paint Fur!
items.headline: Learn to detailed, layered looking paint fur, realistic eyes, use watercolour white, paint textured wood and much more!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this very cheeky Raccoon while I guide you step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
We will be using various techniques throught the process, so get ready to sit, relax and have fun!
How to paint fur

items.title: Ribbons & Hairbows Galore
items.headline: Learn to Create Your Own Feminine Fashions
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be equipped to confidently create feminine, fashionable hair accessories to use for your own families, for gifts, or for an on-the-side entrepreneurial venture.

Make 4 different hairbows, ranging from ones appropriate for a "run around at the park" kind of day, to ones fancily formal and the perfect, stunning addition to a mass of curls at the next wedding or music recital!
Make a wild hair tie to hold those flyaway ponytails!

items.title: Loosen up & paint this lavender field in 5 watercolor steps.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Paint in a relaxed way that will loosen you up & give you a chance to explore colour &  a wet style and have more fun.
objectives_summary: Learn to paint with watercolours in a more impressionistic style.
Enjoy painting in a looser and more relaxed style.
Discover the fun in using more water with your watercolour paints.

items.title: Easy Magic Tricks for Beginners!
items.headline: Learn over 50 easy magic tricks with everyday items and fool your family & friends.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have learnt 21 magic tricks with everyday items.

Wand from Matchbox, Cut & Restored String, Equal & Unequal Ropes, Stretching Paper, Needle Through Balloon, Afghan Bands, Hanky to Egg, Cut Up Banana, Anti Gravity Glasses, Ink to Water, Light & Heavy Glass, Hat & Cup, Dice Prediction, Country & Animal Prediction, 1089 Prediction, Color Prediction, 34 Prediction, Squashed Die Card, The Three Card Trick ,Card Force, Finding a Selected Card
✔ You will receive the full 90 minute video course in 6 lectures containing all 21 tricks

items.title: Embroidery Software: Digitizing an African Leopard in Embird

visible_instructors.title: Philip Viljoen
visible_instructors.job_title: Building Contractor, Author, Coach & Software Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Philip

items.headline: Learn how to use Embroidery Software to Digitizing an African Leopard in Sfumato. How to apply radial background
objectives_summary: Understand the 3 main modules of Embird Embroidery Software
import a basic JPG file and digitize to embroidery file

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Nags Head Sunrise

visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society
visible_instructors.name: Gary

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable/printable full-size 19x13 Traceable Drawing Guide (in 4 parts).
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.

items.title: Chalk pastels for beginners - Autumn landscape and apples
items.headline: An easy lesson designed for success
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, the students will be able to create a project with chalk pastels.
At the end of the course, the students will know  the basic techniques of chalk pastels.
At the end of the course, the students will have two completed projects.

items.title: Watercolor flowers, how to paint in FREE style step by step.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: Learn how to paint these 3 watercolor paintings from the start following easy lessons in a wet in wet style, with a pro.
objectives_summary: The absolute beginner to watercolor painting will first of all learn what equipment to buy and where from.
In the first of 3 watercolors we learn how to paint wet in wet poppies in a really freestyle way.
How to mix bold watercolors on your page.

items.title: Sewing Machine 101
items.headline: Learn to use your sewing machine!
objectives_summary: You will learn all about the dials, buttons and accessories on your machine, gain confidence and learn to make a tote bag!

items.title: How to Draw Lips
items.headline: Learn to Draw and Shade with Realism
objectives_summary: How to draw realistic lips
How to create sketches from scratch
How to develope shading techniques

items.title: Watercolor with Me: Loose and Sketchy Abstract Blooms
items.headline: Let's paint loose, impressionistic watercolor flowers with sketchy accents!
objectives_summary: Loose and sketchy watercolor techniques.
How to create loose sketches of abstract, impressionistic flowers.
Combining watercolor with sketchy colored pencil drawing.

items.title: Hand Embroidery: Mixed media Art with printed fabric
items.headline: Have a close look at the printing fabric offered by Spoonflower
objectives_summary: How to print your favourite design on high quality fabric and  how to add embroidery for a great mixed media project.

items.title: Drawing Caricatures - THE BEST METHOD
items.headline: Plenty of Excellent Caricature Drawing Techniques, with a Focus on the Personality of Your Subject
objectives_summary: How to draw caricatures that reflect the personality of the subject person.

items.title: Watercolor expression. Step by Step
items.headline: Fresh flowers
objectives_summary: 1)How to make an interesting composition
2)How to use a drawing gum
3)How to create a transparent feeling

items.title: Learn how to write Arabic Calligraphy in Ruqa Script

visible_instructors.title: Mothana Al Obaydi
visible_instructors.job_title: Barzingi Institute for Arts and Languages
visible_instructors.name: Mothana

items.headline: The letters of the Arabic Alphabet from Alif to Ya in all its forms will be demonstrated
objectives_summary: How to write all the letters of the Arabic Alphabet in the Ruqa Script
How to choose a calligraphy pen and paper

items.title: Advanced Swirling Soapmaking 1
items.headline: Making swirling designs in soap
objectives_summary: Understand what factors control your design
Learn about swirling tools
Learn about planning and time management
